special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains first strike, vigilance, and trample until end of turn.
[0]: Until end of turn, Warleader Grata becomes a 4/4 Human Knight creature with double strike and indestructible. [i](She doesn't lose loyalty while she's not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.”
